ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: DDD worthless?  How would you change it?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... it s not even worth that much effort.  the time it would take to sit, unmem one song, mem DDD, use DDD, sit, unmem DDD, remem other song is too much effort
ygData.messageBody:
> recast is not an issue since you can swap it out whenever you
> don't have enough
> mana to cast it and swap it back in when you do.

it's not even worth that much effort. the time it would take to sit, unmem
one song, mem DDD, use DDD, sit, unmem DDD, remem other song is too much
effort for this song.

> it may be pitiful, but so is bard melee. does that mean you
> don't melee at all?

that's another subject. i don't think bard melee is pitiful, just the least
of the melee classes. bard melee+SSS+songs pushes us way up on the list,
though i know that is not what you said is pitiful.

> for the sake of brevity, i'll just point to my earlier
> posts where i pointed out when an
> excellent time to use this song was, which wouldn't mess up
> the enchanter at all and would
> do a significant amount of damage.

again, the damage you do is not even worth the effort, and not worth the
mana the healer will spend on fixing the damage you took while the enchanter
messed the 2-4 mobs beating on you that DDD hit.

Shada
